sentence.Network_en: Everyone except a bad little boy whose nickname was Candlewick.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了一个绰号叫“蜡烛芯”的坏孩子以外.

sentence.Network_en: All right, but you are going to regret it, Candlewick laughed.
sentence.Network_cn: “好吧, 但你一定会后悔的, ”蜡烛芯笑着说.

sentence.Network_en: The coachman asked Candlewick if he wanted to go to Gameland.
sentence.Network_cn: 马车主人问“蜡烛芯”是否要去游戏王国.
